markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Zombie Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3251)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Necromantic augmentations grant this zombie giant increased power.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=46)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Zombie Brute](/Monsters.aspx?ID=3251)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=652" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=722" />
<trait label="Unholy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=521" />
<trait label="Zombie" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=782" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 357 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +4; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** -3

**Con** +4

**Int** -5

**Wis** +0

**Cha** -2
</row>

**Slow** A zombie is permanently [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=92) and can't use reactions.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 15 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +3 

**Will** +6 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 70
([void healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=83))

</row>

**Immunities**
bleed, [death](/Traits.aspx?ID=571) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=578), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=647), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=669), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=95)

**Weaknesses**
slashing 10, vitality 10

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +11 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d12+5 bludgeoning plus [Improved Push](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=66) 5 feet

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-487" />
name: Zombie Brute
